description: This file contains test functions for the 'Team' class in the 'agno' package, specifically testing coordinator team functionalities including basic operation, context sharing, and structured output with custom models.

classes.name: Article
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing an article with title, summary, and reference links.

methods.name: test_coordinator_team_basic
methods.description: Tests the basic functionality of a coordinator team, ensuring it can generate a response and handle multiple members.

methods.name: test_coordinator_team_with_context_sharing
methods.description: Tests a coordinator team with context sharing enabled, verifying it can summarize information from multiple sources.

methods.name: test_coordinator_team_with_structured_output
methods.description: Tests a coordinator team with a custom structured output model, verifying the response contains the expected structured data.
